body:
It seems to have to do with the number of cases in the type switch.

Here is a standalone test case: http://play.golang.org/p/kUOKZGIK4o .

If I remove even one case, the file compiles.

I suppose we should consider fixing this if we ever make a Go 1.4.4 release.  Otherwise, since it works in Go 1.5 and tip, there is nothing to do.
